column4: i'm running Ubuntu 9.04 and I'm running into this bug: http://bugzilla.intellinuxwireless.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1885 Can anybody PLEASE help me fix this? Is there an Ubuntu package I can install to fix it?? Please *help* Its EXTREMELY urgent!!!
There's a patch attached. Try that.
i can see that...but I need to connect to the internet using ubuntu to actually install it. Have the Ubuntu developers already put this fix out? Can you help me with that??
Alas, I can't. You can try looking at !launchpad, though. For urgent stuff, I think you're out of luck.
